verbose_text: The results revealed that PI3K inhibitor, LY294002, partially abrogated the anti-apoptotic effects of puerarin, confirming that the PI3K / Akt pathway is critical in the anti-apoptotic effect of puerarin against DEX induced apoptosis in hFOB1.19 cells.
evidence: PI3K inhibitor, LY294002, partially abrogated the anti-apoptotic effects of puerarin
